title: Please Take The 2020 SSC Survey!
summary:
Key ideas
- Scott is asking his readers to take a survey.
- The survey will help him gather information for future blog posts.
- The survey has two parts and should take about 25 minutes to complete.
- There are limitations and risks associated with taking the survey, but respondents can choose to make their answers private.

Key learnings
- The survey will provide Scott with data for future blog posts.
- Respondents have the option to make their answers private.
- Some limitations and risks are associated with taking the survey, but these can be mitigated.

Key questions
- Will readers take the survey and help Scott gather useful data?
- How can respondents ensure their answers are accurate and not affected by limitations or risks?
- What interesting findings and crowd-sourced life advice will Scott gather from the survey responses?
- Who will be the two randomly selected respondents to win a large monetary prize, and what will the caveats be?
